STBLKeyStringList.Text: {0.SimFirstName} unlocked the Eco-Matic Smog Vacuum for crafting on the Fabricator!
{0.SimFirstName} unlocked the Flowers and Flora Rug for crafting on the Fabricator!
{0.SimFirstName} unlocked the Hydroponic Planter for crafting on the Fabricator!
The quality of the Concept has been improved. Your chances of success when submitting it for approval have increased!
The quality of the Concept remains the same. You never know though, maybe the boss at Lean Green Design Co-Op will like it anyway.
Lean Green Design Co-Op liked the concept! Career performance and Simoleons gained. Congratulations!
Hmmm. The Concept you submitted to Innovative Solutions Corp. wasn't the best work and they weren't too impressed. Better quality concepts have a greater chance of success in this competitive space.
Great work! The Concept you submitted to Innovative Solutions Corp. was quite impressive, and they think so too! Your boss agrees and gave you a great review and bonus.
Lean Green Design Co-Op loved the concept! Career performance and Simoleons gained, and an Eco-Invention has been unlocked on for creation on the Fabricator.

{1.SimFirstName} isn't too impressed by {0.SimFirstName}'s interview technique and questions. {0.SimFirstName} gets told in no uncertain terms that it is none of their business what N.A.P.s they support.
{1.SimFirstName} isn't too impressed by {0.SimFirstName}'s interview technique and questions. {0.SimFirstName} gets told in no uncertain terms that it is none of their business.
Naughty, naughty, naughty. We caught you Woohooing! Don't you know we see everything?

{0.SimFirstName} has been fined in accordance with the Power Conservation Action Plan.

Too much Power was consumed this week.

This Household will receive a daily fine until Power usage gets under control.

{0.SimFirstName} has been fined in accordance with the Water Conservation Action Plan.

Too much Water was consumed this week.

This Household will receive a daily fine until Water usage gets under control.
{1.SimFirstName} got a birthday gift from {0.SimFirstName}! Happy Birthday! What did {M1.he}{F1.she} get?\n\n{2.String}
{0.SimFirstName} made a special fabricated gift just for {1.SimFirstName}! What a {M0.guy}{F0.girl}! Here's what {1.SimFirstName} got:\n\n{2.String}
{1.SimFirstName} just got a special neighborly gift from {0.SimFirstName}:\n\n{2.String}

Aw man, it looks like I missed you! Who’s going to be my Neighborhood Action Plans partner-in-crime now? Don’t let me down, Champ. There are still some prime initiatives for us money-makers to vote for:
  • Modern Development
  • Tech Support
  • Promote Creative Arts
I’ve given you a few Influence Points from my personal stash to get you started. You can vote at either a public Voting Board or even at your own Mailbox. Voting ends on {2.DayOfWeekLong} at {2.TimeShort}! Check the Simology Panel (Y) for more info!

Aw shucks, I guess you’re not home. I had just wanted to let you know that you can vote on Neighborhood Action Plans! If you want to help get our neighborhood to a better Eco Footprint, there are a lot of great options you can help me in supporting:
  • Green Initiatives
  • Eco-Friendly Appliances
  • Clean Energy Production
Voting is easy! I’ve given you a few Influence Points to get you started. You can Vote at either a public Voting Board or even at your own Mailbox. Voting ends on {2.DayOfWeekLong} at {2.TimeShort}! Check the Simology Panel (Y) for more info.
You know, now that I'm pretty much done with what I wanted to do here, do you mind if I hang out for a bit? How has your day been?
HEYAAAA, CHAMP! I'm your new neighbor, {0.SimFirstName}. So... you like money, right? Let's talk. I'm going to let you in on a little secret about how things work around here...
Hey neighbor! Do you want to learn how you can make a difference? If you’ve got a minute I’d love to chat with you about how your vote can help make this neighborhood more green.
Your lifestyle is ruining the environment! Don't you even care? Since you refuse to hear my advice, you give me no other option than to take matters into my own hands. The trees have spoken...
Hey! I got a special gift for you because you're such a good neighbor and I appreciate your kindness and friendship! Want to see what it is?
Hey! What happened to that money your promised me? What gives?
Hey buddy! Got a minute to help me with some recyclables? I heard you have a Recycler and if you let me use it I'll give you all the bits and pieces I get from it for free. How does that sound?
I fabricated something cool for you last weekend because I think you're pretty cool. Can I come in and show it to you?
Hey there, neighbor! Do I hear the sizzle of something broken in there? Oh dear! Would you like help with that? I'm a bit of a handy Sim.
I heard it was someone's birthday today. I brought a cool gift! Yoohoo, can I come in?
Oh wow. You've got quite the mess on your hands in here, don't you, you dirty little hoarder? Want some help cleaning up all that trash?
What?! I don't remember that. Fine... here's a few thousand Simoleons for the trouble I caused. I won't call any more.
Thanks {0.SimFirstName}! I can always count on you!
Aw, but how else are my dreams supposed to come true? Thanks anyway. I guess.

You WHAT!? Don't you realize how important Neighborhood Action Plans are for the community?!\n\nWell, if you change your mind, you can submit your vote by {2.DayOfWeekLong} at {2.TimeShort} either at your Mailbox or at a public Voting Board.
Show me our Neighborhood Voting Board

What?! Why would you do that!? Didn't you read the fine print of "{3.String}"!? It is not a good idea. Our plan, on the other hand, will be very good for this neighborhood.\n\nWell in any case, don't forget to submit your vote by {2.DayOfWeekLong} at {2.TimeShort} either at your Mailbox or a public Voting Board.

Very good. Our N.A.P. is going to pass if we get more votes. Thank you for your support. Together we can make sure there is a bright future for our neighborhood!\n\nDon't forget to submit your vote by {2.DayOfWeekLong} at {2.TimeShort} either at your Mailbox or at a public Voting Board.
You think so? I wasn't sure... but you're right. I guess it just wasn't written in the stars.
You're right, of course I should say yes! What was I thinking!? OMG I can't believe this is happening.

What do I want? I don't know what I want! I wanted you to decide for me. It's obvious I can't count on you for huge and impactful life decisions that don't really concern you. Thanks for nothing, {0.SimName}.
Oh right. That's true. I think I understand my life now.
Wow, I never even thought of that. Dreams are so weird.
Hmm... interesting observation. Are you some kind of dream specialist?
Oh... that's a good point. I must have seen it on TV. Oh well!
Aw, that makes me feel better about it. You're a good friend. Thanks!
What?! How rude. I'm going back to sleep. Do me a favor and don't show up in my dreams again, ok?
No, I guess I'm not. Thanks for giving me a reality check.
Alright... well... I think... yes! We'll do it! Thanks for the advice. We're having a baby!
What? You don't think I'd make a good parent?! I'd be an amazing parent!! We're going to go Try for a Baby right now. Take that, ha!
Ok, well thanks anyway, I guess.
Ah... yeah I guess that's true. I do make the world brighter with my smile! I feel so much better now. Thanks, {0.SimFirstName}.
Hmm... I guess you're not responding. Does that mean you don't want to hang out with me?
Oh. Sure. No worries. Let's just pretend this never happened, okay?
Wow, really? That's so awesome! Oh, I'm so happy I worked up the courage to ask. Let me know what works for you and we'll go out.
(From Agreeing with a Neighbor about Recycling)
That's the spirit! All it takes is something simple. A plastic bottle here, a paper cup there. We can do this!
I know it's hard to figure out what to do, but we can at least try, can't we? We've got to at least try. I encourage you to buy a Recycler for your home.
You are a horrible person. I hope the trees come to life and attack you.
Ha ha! That's a good one. Thanks for the laugh.
That's not funny. This is serious.
Calm down? CALM DOWN? What do you think I am? I'll calm down when I'm ready to calm down!!
I feel a bit better. At least there's one Sim in the world who really gets me.
You and I are on the same page. The whole idea is crazy. Kudos.
Sounds like you didn't check the Simspedia article. I don't get you.
Exactly! I saw it on Simspedia, that's what it said.
No, that's wrong! I don't even know who you are anymore.

Very well. However, now that you've accepted I must inform you that you will only get this money if you become married within 7 days. Those are the terms! Good luck and congratulations on the next chapter in your life.
You've satisfied the conditions to get the inheritance money. You'll get a deposit soon. Congratulations!
Suit yourself. Say goodbye to your Simoleons.

Oh... very clever. Well, there were some conditions. But one of the conditions was there would be no conditions if you asked if there were any conditions. So... there are no conditions... wait... right?
Well too bad. We're turning off your power right now, actually. I hope you're stocked up on books and candles. Have a nice day.
(From Landgrab Power Company Turning off the Power)
Very good. This was just a test to make sure you were ready. Enjoy a discount on your next bill.
*Sigh* I understand. You're a busy, successful young {M0.man}{F0.lady} now. I guess my {M0.boy}{F0.girl} grew up to be just like me. I miss you though. I'll always be here if you need me, okay?
Well... sure, if you've got nothing else happening, I'll pop on by! I'll see you in a few.
Hey! You actually visited us like you said you would! Aw, you're such a good kid. We love you.
Okay then! I hope we see you, though!
Hey wait... don't you want to... *click*
Ha ha, you just got PRANKED!
HAAAAA I knew you'd love that!
Yeah... yeah... see? It's funny, right? None of my friends thought so, but I guess being cool must run in the family.
Of course! It's getting immediately deposited into your account. You really helped me out.
That's so sweet. You are such a good friend. I'm at least giving you something, though. I won't take no for an answer! You deserve it.
Thank you for your contribution. Do you feel happier yet?
Well... then let's get going! I'll be waiting at the secret location.
Uh... no. It only ends when there is one Sim left standing. If it only lasted a fortnight that just wouldn't be epic enough.
Okay, fine. But don't be surprised when you find yourself stuck in a room with no doors or a pool surrounded by walls. C-ya!
Come meet me right now. Unfortunately, no one can explain exactly what The Simulation is. You'll just have to see it for yourself.
Oh okay... listen... I need a place to stash this money... take it. Don't tell anyone.
Your neighborhood's Eco Footprint is Green! Learn more in the Eco Footprint lesson.
Your neighborhood's Eco Footprint is Industrial! Learn more in the Eco Footprint lesson.
Your neighborhood's Eco Footprint is Neutral! Learn more in the Eco Footprint lesson.
For me? Thank you, {0.SimFirstName}! Hey, you might be able to use this...\n {2.String}
{0.SimFirstName} didn't get any inspiration from chatting with {1.SimFirstName} about fabrication.
{0.SimFirstName}, you seem really into making your own stuff... maybe you could try making a couch sometime?\n\n•{0.SimFirstName} unlocked the Fabricated Couch recipe!
You know, I'm tired of not sitting around, {0.SimFirstName}. It'd be awesome if you thought up a way to make a couch!\n\n•{0.SimFirstName} unlocked the Fabricated Couch recipe!
That's neat, {0.SimFirstName}! Maybe you should make something functional, like a desk?\n\n•{0.SimFirstName} unlocked the Fabricated Desk recipe!
We're always talking about what we make, {0.SimFirstName}, but never where we work! Maybe you should design a desk!\n\n•{0.SimFirstName} unlocked the Fabricated Desk recipe!
{0.SimFirstName}, you're pretty savvy with making... can you do something with Electronic Upgrade Parts?\n\n•{0.SimFirstName} unlocked the Fabricated Electronic Upgrade Parts recipe!
{0.SimFirstName}, not only can we make things... we can upgrade them! Did you know your Fabricator can print electronics?\n\n•{0.SimFirstName} unlocked the Fabricated Electronic Upgrade Parts recipe!
Is it really being a maker if we never cut into the drywall? I bet you could design and mount a great wall light!\n\n•{0.SimFirstName} unlocked the Fabricated Wall Light recipe!
Is it dim in your makerspace? You've got to be able to see if you're gonna make things.. so go make a light!\n\n•{0.SimFirstName} unlocked the Fabricated Wall Light recipe!
{0.SimFirstName} picked up some fabrication tips from {1.SimFirstName}!
(From Finding a Nifty Object in the Dumpster)
(From Eating a Meal Out of a Dumpster)
{0.SimFirstName} has collected the following objects from the insect farm.\n{2.String}
Fizz Enthusiast's review mentions "putting the 'meh' in 'mehdiocre'" and "nothing that separates it from the pack." Probably best to leave it at that. You'll receive {1.Money} for your "efforts."
Fizz Enthusiasts received your submission, and they wish they hadn't. It falls rather flat, so it will only receive {1.Money}, purely for submitting.
Fizz Enthusiasts calls your submission "full-flavored" and "sofizzticated!" They enjoyed the fruits of your labor so much, that they'd like to award you {1.Money}!
Fizz Enthusiasts claim your craft submission was quite pleasant and well rounded. Well done! They would like to award you with {1.Money}.

Fizz Enthusiasts have named your submitted craftwork World Class! They claim that its bold flavors and complex notes have set itself as the new standard in fizzing. It will be featured on the cover of the annual publication Dizzy Fizz Connoisseur! For this achievement, will be awarded {1.Money}.

You received your first Bits and Pieces from using the Recycler! Hover over the Recycler or the Household Funds to see how much you have.

Bits and Pieces are used to craft items using the Fabricator and to fuel Water and Power utility-producing objects.

Recycling things found in the dumpster is a good way to get more Bits and Pieces!
(From a Green Fiend using Too Much Utilities)

I'm glad you asked. Waste management is an important function of any household, and helps avoid the outbreak of hygiene issues like germs and pests. I also inspected your outdoor trash and emptied any full trash cans. This service will cost you {0.Money}.
Remember to take care of your outdoor trashcans! You were charged {0.Money} for this visit.
Howl for houndstooth! {0.SimFirstName} has found a special dye in the dumpster depths. Check {0.SimFirstName}'s inventory.
{0.SimFirstName} is a Freegan Sim. Freeganism is all about cost-free, waste-free living.
{0.SimFirstName} is a Maker. They find joy in making things on the fabricator, woodworking table, and candle-making stations. They become sad when they haven't completed a project recently.

{0.SimFirstName} made it! Like, {M0.he}{F0.she} literally made it. With {M0.his}{F0.her} new skills {M0.he}{F0.she} can fabricate objects and doodads {M0.he}{F0.she} didn't even know existed. Trait Earned: Muse of the Maker {0.SimFirstName} can now Fabricate objects and make Candles with only half the resources {M0.he}{F0.she} needed before!
This Sim wants to become an expert at Fabrication!

{0.SimFirstName} has become a major player in {M0.his}{F0.her} local community. Now will {M0.he}{F0.she} use their newfound sway for the greater good or for personal gain? Trait Earned: Influential Individual Ability to dramatically impact a Sim's relationship with other nearby Sims by using either the Shun Him/Her or the Cheer Him/Her Social Interactions.
This Sim wants to build a better, greener community.
This will boost the speed at which your Sim gains Fabrication Skill while in a Club Gathering.
This will boost the speed at which your Sim gains Juice Fizzing Skill while in a Club Gathering.
"It'll generate water..." they said. "Won't it be helpful?" they said. Now {0.SimFirstName} is soaking wet, because repairing water generators isn't always as easy as it looks.
{0.SimFirstName} listened carefully to the idea, and kindly provided some much needed major improvements.
{0.SimFirstName}’s skilled scribblings have been validated in the forge of public opinion.
Despite {0.SimFirstName}'s passionate oratory, the watchers were unmoved. Sadly, sentiment for that N.A.P. remains neutral.
Feeling especially malicious, {0.SimFirstName} released an unwelcome cloud of badness back into the local environment.
Just being in the area is making things hazy.
Almost had them convinced, but some Sims just don't care enough about the environment to make lifestyle changes.
Being environmentally friendly is important and all, but I'd prefer to keep my Simoleons.
All it took was a little nudge to convince {0.SimFirstName} that maybe {M0.he}{F0.she} can make a difference... by buying more things.
This place has some crazy neighbors. Why are they always trying to get into my business?
The nerve of some people! Saving the world through actively following Action Plans is apparently not important enough for Sims like that.
If I wanted your opinion, I would ask for it!
Why can't we just keep our current N.A.P.s? It's exhausting to think about so much change.
It could have been a bad approach? Or maybe there was just food in {0.SimFirstName}'s teeth. Either way, that didn't go over very well.
Ugh, solicitors are the worst. Best to avoid eye contact next time.
One step closer to making the world a better place.
That rousing speech was so convincing that the anticipation to vote is overwhelming.
{0.SimFirstName}'s parent really wanted to see {M0.him}{F0.her}. Why couldn't {M0.he}{F0.she} make a little time to visit?
{0.SimFirstName} just never thought {M0.his}{F0.her} vote could make that much of a difference.
{0.SimFirstName} just had a verbal shunning from an angry neighbor about how {M0.he}{F0.she} is damaging the environment. Nobody could have known that this would be so complicated, okay!?
{0.SimFirstName} is determined to start recycling now after some encouragement from the community. Let's do this! Mother Earth waits for no one!

{0.SimFirstName} accepted the offer of a giant inheritance over the phone, but now {M0.he}{F0.she} has only 7 days to get married to satisfy the hidden conditions of the reward. Why does this always seem to happen to {M0.him}{F0.her}!?
The Landgraab Power Company is at it again, those scoundrels! If they maintained the power lines and kept the acorns from building up, maybe there wouldn't even be a squirrel problem!
Gah! {0.SimFirstName} has been duped by an immature prank caller. How infuriating!
{0.SimFirstName} doesn't know what that Simstagram meme was all about... but it wasn't really funny. Was {M0.he}{F0.she} supposed to laugh or something? This is awkward.
{0.SimFirstName} thinks {M0.he}{F0.she} might feel a little bit happier after sending a Simoleon to the person that just called. Maybe... sort of... not really...
{0.SimFirstName} has lost the Motive Trials. May the odds be more in {M0.his}{F0.her} favor next time.
It was a battle to the bitter end, but {0.SimFirstName} survived as the last Sim standing. It was honestly a ton of fun. Seems like this is bound to become some kind of fad or something.
{0.SimFirstName} was simply trying to test {M0.his}{F0.her} free will, but we can only show the path that must be followed... only {M0.he}{F0.she} can be the one to follow it.

{0.SimFirstName} doesn't know the future and didn't come to tell you how this is going to end. {M0.He}{F0.She} came to tell you how it's going to begin. {0.SimFirstName} is going to show these Sims a world you didn't want them to see. A world without motives. A world without Whims or Aspirations. A world without you.
This gives a whole new meaning to getting down and funky, doesn't it?
This dirty birdie may have found some amazing treasures, but {F0.she}{M0.he} still can't help but taste a tinge of regret.
The loathsome stench, it lingers like a well-aged cheese.
{0.SimFirstName} will never be able to look at garbage the same way again. This filthy sight has been seared in {M0.his}{F0.her} memory forever.
The stench wafts through your mind. It's peeling and curdling all good thoughts from your dreams.
The ooey gooeyness of being cradled by garbage makes you all warm and fuzzy inside and out.
{0.SimFirstName} has been awoken to the value of living an Eco Lifestyle. {M0.He}{F0.She} should take advantage of this focus to go do something green right now!
There's nothing quite like breathing in some crisp, clean air.
The air feels a little heavier than usual, but industry is booming.
Bugs are gross enough to look at, much less eat!
{0.SimFirstName} has impressed the right people! The community looks up to {0.SimFirstName} as a local hero. For now anyway...

{0.SimFirstName} has offended the wrong Sim! {M0.He}{F0.She} had better keep {M0.his}{F0.her} head down and work on mending {M0.his}{F0.her} relationships. Being seen with {0.SimFirstName} is currently a big taboo.
The only thing more fiery than those bombardier beetle nuggets is {0.SimFirstName}'s desire for vengeance.
The fizz is starting to take effect.
The fizz is subtly taking over... maybe not so subtle... suddenly {0.SimFirstName} is feeling a bit more Confident.
I feel the Confidence within me radiating, almost EXPLODING! But I'm fairly certain one more drink may put me over the edge...
The fizz is starting to take effect.
The fizz is subtly taking over... maybe not so subtle... suddenly {0.SimFirstName} is feeling like {M0.he}{F0.she} can take over the world with a renewing energy burst!
The Energy within me feels EXPLOSIVE! But I'm fairly certain one more drink may put me over the edge...
The fizz is starting to take effect.
The fizz is subtly taking over... maybe not so subtle... {0.SimFirstName} is now feeling a bit on the Flirty side, bring in some romance!
Feeling the EXPLOSIVE Flirtiness in the air. But I'm fairly certain one more drink may put me over the edge...
The fizz is starting to take effect.
The fizz is subtly taking over... maybe not so subtle... this may be what {0.SimFirstName} needed to be a little more Focused.
The Focus I'm feeling is quite EXPLOSIVE right now! But I'm fairly certain one more drink may put me over the edge...
The fizz is starting to take effect.
The fizz is subtly taking over... maybe not so subtle... {0.SimFirstName} has now a smile on {M0.his}{F0.her} face.
The Happiness within me is EXPLODING! But I'm fairly certain one more drink may put me over the edge...
The fizz is starting to take effect.
The fizz is subtly taking over... maybe not so subtle... {0.SimFirstName} is now feeling a bit more Inspired!
I'm feeling an EXPLODING rush of Inspiration! But I'm fairly certain one more drink may put me over the edge...
It was just too much. One too many. Probably best to stay asleep; waking up will not be any easier.
Who knew having so much 'bucha would have this kind of effect!
The Bucha is starting to take effect.
Huh. Yeah. That Bucha has quite a kick!
The Bucha is sinking in and is this zen or something else...?
The Bucha is starting to take effect.
Huh. Yeah. That Bucha has quite a kick!
The Bucha is sinking in and is this zen or something else...?
Huh, it suddenly got a bit dark, and not talking about the lighting...
Wow, never realized how much sadness there is in the world. Wait why is my mind going there...?
I can't seem to remember anything. I can't tell if this is real or a dream. Deep down inside I feel I want to cry. This terrible kombucha and darkness stops me. Why?? Ugh...
One might say there's power in sadness. Maybe we should ask the Grim Reaper?
The fizz is starting to take effect.
The fizz is subtly taking over... maybe not so subtle... {0.SimFirstName} is feeling a bit more Playful now, hopefully not too hysterical.
Feeling a strong, EXPLODING feeling of Playfulness! But I'm fairly certain one more drink may put me over the edge...
Sometimes, you're just having way too much fun to be concerned about your well-being!
There's something unsettling in this fizz. Not sure which end it will come out...
Hmm... not sure if this was fizzed right...
Talking fizz-shop is so gratifying and really gets the juices going!
Instead of being fizzically inspired by this conversation, it's fallen flat, lost its bite and left a poor taste in your mouth.
Your cerebellum has been pumped full of bubbly fizz-focused knowledge.
You've fizzled out while trying to expound on your fantastic fizz facts.
{0.SimFirstName} feels the power of the snapdragon flowing through {M0.him}{F0.her}!
Nothing says energy like the smell of an avalanche of electrified orchids! Embrace the power!
A smell so soft, delicate, and enticing shows that love is indeed in the air.
Candles and roses are both classic romantic elements. The scent of a rose infused candle? That's taking things to the next level.
The scent of the humble daisy has many properties. It has the power to calm and provide focus to any that linger in its aroma.
Nothing like the smell of sage to quiet the mind and provide focus for the tasks at hand.
Nothing like the smell of a blue bell candle to help drive your cares away.
Just try saying Chrysanthemum quickly five times. It's so funny! You can't do it! Chrysanthemum! Chrysanthermum! Chrysanthernmun! Chrysanthymememem! Chrrrrrrrrysanthernemuuuuuuum! See?
It's like someone took all of the dances of the Birds of Paradise around the world, smashed them together into a scent and put it in a candle.
It's said that lilies laid by the tombstone of a loved one can make us remember subtle details of their lives. Most notably, the way they smelled.
The Grim Reaper may not smell very good, but this candle sure does. Experience the emotions of a funeral without anyone actually dying.
Feeling really bad after those two drinks...
I'm the ghost with the most!
Tricked into drinking a drink! I could just dye!
Feeling good after a drink from over the rainbow.
Crickets, Grubs, Beetles?!?! Why do Sims eat these things?!
Why did it have to be bugs?
It can't be just hanging there, right? Meat doesn't just happily grow on walls.
{0.SimFirstName} thought it was only llamas that could spit...
The fabricator's in a fighting mood today.
Purchasing a new object is frivolous and wasteful. Freegan Sims prefer to find items for free, or at least at a steep discount.
What an expensive purchase! {0.SimFirstName}'s values feel compromised by participating in such material consumerism.

{0.SimFirstName} used to believe in a world where Sims didn't have to work for Simoleons. But then, {F0.her}{M0.his} Freegan beliefs were abandoned in favor of a steady paycheck. You've changed, dude.

After a long period of serving {F0.her}{M0.his} corporate overlords, {0.SimFirstName} has finally had enough and quit. It may be a little more difficult to get by without a salary, but you can't put a price on living in tune with your values.

{0.SimFirstName} tastes a note of acridity, hint of mold, and the dulcet, cloying tones of bacterial growth. But all in all, the food seems relatively uncompromised from sitting in the garbage. It's not great, it's not terrible... it's just fine.
Another Sim's trash is a Freegan Sim's treasure. That's not a figure of speech - {0.SimFirstName} just found an awesome item in the dumpster. Take that, retail industry and rampant consumerism!
{0.SimFirstName} cooked a meal with the ingredients supplied to {M0.him}{F0.her}, which saved {M0.him}{F0.her} some Simoleons. The cheaper the meal, the better it tastes!

That food {0.SimFirstName} just found was surely headed to the dump. Thanks to a bit of industriousness and a willingness to get dirty, {M0.he}{F0.she} was able to save that grub from a wasteful fate. Every little morsel counts!

If you don't ask, you don't receive! {0.SimFirstName} may have been a bit pushy by asking for a discount, but that's a small price to pay in the pursuit of paying a smaller price. The next item purchased from the vendor will be discounted. Sweet!

They say haggling is an art form, but {0.SimFirstName} knows scoring a discount comes down to persistence. Now if only {M0.he}{F0.she} could have negotiated to receive {M0.his}{F0.her} next purchase for free... that would really be living in accordance with {M0.his}{F0.her} Freegan philosophy.

Why cook a meal the expensive way? Go forage up some ingredients and save some money! A garden, a garbage, your neighbor's fridge - these are all better sources of ingredients than purchasing them yourself.

Freegan Sims aren't fussy about where they sleep - as long as they aren't paying the rent, the location is just fine. Landlords and security think that squatting on someone else's property is wrong, but that's just like, their opinion.
What a breath of fresh air
A greener world is a better world! {0.SimFirstName} is feeling pretty inspired at how green this neighborhood is getting
{0.SimFirstName} is embarrassed from excessive power and water consumption. That's not eco-friendly!
Ugh, the air feels so gross and the land feels so unnatural! Why can't this neighborhood be a bit more green?
Skill recognizes skill! How'd they do it?
The existential sadness of not making something has crept in.
There's a certain joy in making something you can hold in your hands.
{0.SimFirstName} is struggling to find stuff to scavenge, resulting in high-levels of stress!
{0.SimFirstName} is feeling pumped from engaging in their number one hobby! While {0.SimFirstName} has this Moodlet, upgrade interactions can be completed faster.
There's nothing around to reduce, reuse OR recycle! Must... find... something... to... RECYCLE!!!
{0.SimFirstName} was caught breaking down something someone else hadn't thrown away. They must work harder to control their impulses!
“Why don’t you buzz off and bother someone else’s trash can?”
Only few creatures can survive a nuclear apocalypse, so these roaches easily spurn {0.SimFirstName}’s futile attempt to send them on their way.
{0.SimFirstName} breathes a sigh of relief as frantically stomping has cleared the area of insect incursion.
After being painfully rejected in the quest for kinship with the buzzing swarm, maybe {0.SimFirstName} should be careful interacting with flies in the future.
The geothermal heat makes for a great swim.
Naturally filtered spring water from the tap.
Having a mentor when making something can make learning fabrication quite fun!
Did it just move? No that is impossible. Isn't it?
I bet they just throw this stuff in the dump.
Nothing is quite as satisfying as making something with your hands.
WE'RE JUST PUPPETS DANCING ON THEIR STRINGS!!!
Some Sims just want to watch the world burn.
Some Sims always want to be the center of attention.
Why aren't we talking about me?

{0.SimFirstName} has been recognized for great performance and client satisfaction! Dealing with the fickle clients and finger cramps were worth it in the end. In addition to raising {F0.her}{M0.his} rate, {0.SimFirstName} also received rewards!\n\n{7.String}
I need your help. For science. My brother says cylindrical candles burn better. I say rectangular candles burn better. Help us settle this! I need your best rectangular candles.
These burned so inconsistently we couldn't settle the argument.
I don't even care what the original argument with my brother was. These candles are so nice.
We never really determined what determines "burns better", but these were nice candles.

I messed up. I bought a bunch of candelabras on the cheap for a party I'm throwing. Problem is I didn't realize they only seat square based candles. I need a batch of your rectangular candles as soon as possible.
These things didn't even fit. Worthless.
You've sold me on rectangular candles. These are amazing.
These fit pretty well! Nice save.

Have you ever thought about what it must be like to be a candle? Your sole purpose is to burn away into nothingness. From birth you are doomed to the flame. Yet in your passing you banish away the darkness. Please send me a batch of these doomed heroes, I wish to think on this.
I felt nothing as I watched these candles putter out. How disappointing.
I wept as I watched the magnificent flame of your candles fade into darkness. I am moved beyond words.
I watched the life fade from one of your candles. I was there in its last moments. How profound.

Are motivational candles a thing? They are now. My team is working on a huge contract and I'd like to lighten the atmosphere with some carved candles all over the office. I'll handle the fire marshal, you just give me the best you've got.
The office nearly burned down. The fire marshal is furious. Whose terrible idea was this?
The mood here has been so cheery! All thanks to your candles.
I can feel the morale boost around here already.

Nothing says victory like fancy candles. I'd like a set of your more elaborate carved candles. We're celebrating my best friend's win in the Blicblock regionals. This is a big deal for her so we're going all out.
One of your candles exploded. I didn't even know candles could explode. Terrible craftsmanship.
She was so happy, she cried. Thanks for the amazing candles!
She loved them! Thanks for helping to brighten the celebration!

You've heard of fire dancing right? I'm experimenting with something new I call candle dancing. There is a lot of nuance to it but you can use your imagination. Since this will be for a performance I'd like to order a set of your fanciest carved candles. I'll send my specifications. Thank you.
Can You Do the Candle Candle
This was an awful idea. I got molten wax in my eye.
My candle dancing show was a rousing success. Thanks so much!
My show was well received. I'll be in contact in the future.
Nothing is as sad as an empty wall. I've heard you're the one to talk to for wall décor.
What a letdown. I think I prefer my walls bare.
I'm impressed. You've exceeded my expectations. My walls are delightful with your décor.
I knew you were the right choice. Thank you.
A so called "friend" came over yesterday. They commented that my walls were bare. How dare they! Give me the finest wall decorations you have and we'll see whose walls are "bare".
You had one job. One! They didn't even comment on my walls! What did I even pay you for?

Hahah! I win! My "friend" came over and practically wept at the beauty of my walls. I then cast this friend out and shuttered the windows so they might never gaze upon your magnificent decorations again.
Hah! They said my walls were nice looking. That'll show them.
I had a plumbing incident that resulted in my wall décor being soaked in sewage. I need your help redecorating the walls. Also to help me forget about the image of sewage flowing down my walls.
Ugh. This might be worse than they looked before.
Things are as good as new! Thank you for helping me get past this mess.
Nice. The walls are looking better.

Hey, I just moved into a new apartment, and would you believe it - no ceiling lights! You'd think I would have noticed that before I signed the lease, but oh well. Would you be able to make me a few Floor Lights?
These lights are horrible. I think I'd rather sit in the dark.
These lights are great! Why would we even want lights on the ceiling?
These lights are what I was looking for. Terrible selfie lighting, but they do the trick.

Day 67: The darkness. This sorrowful, dismal darkness. When my last remaining lightbulb shattered, some time ago, I swore “HARK! No big deal - I’ll just run out and get a few replacement bulbs in the morning”.\n\nBut alas, the devious trickery of the daily rays of sun hath soothed me into a woeful cycle of vile procrastination. That sweet light, followed each looming night by the familiar shroud of dreary, unending darkness. The wretched darkness. I could really use a Floor Light.
Light at the End of the Tunnel
Now even pain is dear to me.
You are the light in my darkness.
The warm glow of these lights bring warmth to my cold heart.

My triplets are obsessed with your work. They all follow you on Simstagram and they're always asking me to get them something you made. Next week is their birthday and I'd love to surprise them with something truly delightful! Would you be able to Fabricate 3 Floor Lights for my kiddo's bedrooms?
The workmanship on these is highly suspect. There are sharp edges my kids could cut themselves on.
These are magnificent lights. The kids love them!
These are really nice lights. Thanks!
Hey I'm going to a concert next weekend. You know that thing people do with the lighters? I want to do that but with candles. How awesome would that be? I'd like to order a batch please.
This was a terrible idea. Wax everywhere. The venue threw us out for causing a fire hazard.
It was like nothing I've seen before. An undulating sea of flames! Amazing.
Hey, it worked! There is wax everywhere but the concert was a hit.

Hi there! I run a local business. We're trying a new promotion called Lover's Night. Any couples that come in get a special discount menu and are serviced by candlelight. If this goes well we're going to need a lot of candles. Think you could fill the order?
Your candles nearly burned my venue down.
Lover's Night was a smash hit! Your candles set the perfect mood.
Nice. Love is in the air.

I mentor budding artists at my local Maker Space. To help them gather creative inspiration, I ask them to focus their mind's eye on a single candle, burning steadily in a dark room. One of them suggested that a visual aid might help the beginners. Can you provide me with a few candles?
These candles are no good. They sputter and burn unevenly in a way that interrupts my students' focus.
These candles are unique. They burn bright and true in a way that inspires deep thought.
This candle is like any other candle. The inherent equality between candles is something to meditate on.
Hi there, I'd like to order a child sized bed. My daughter thought it would be a good idea to use hers as a trampoline. Please make an extra sturdy one. Thank you.
I installed the bed two hours ago and she's already broken it again. Thanks for nothing.
Wow! My child jumped on the bed for 3 hours and didn't do any damage. This bed is amazing.
This is a very nice bed. She's already started jumping on it so we might be speaking soon.
Back in my day, us kids slept on the floor next to the fireplace for warmth. Things were - different back in my day. I'd like to order a bed for my child, as comfortable as you can make it.
My kid hates this bed. Things were better back in my day.
My kid loves the bed! Those old days really were the worst.
My kid likes the bed. Kids these days have it so good.
Ugh! My kid got bit by bed bugs last night. Obviously the only answer was to take her bed out into the driveway and burn it with fire. She's fine now but we need a new bed. Could you send one over?
My child came screaming into my room crying about the nightmares your bed gave her.
My daughter wanted me to tell you she's never slept so well in her life.
This will do. Finally a good night's sleep for my kid.

Hello, my store would like to procure an order of your homemade Kombucha. We are attempting to fight the faceless Big Kombucha companies by distributing beverages made by local artisans. We even have a hip throwback slogan for the display. "It's da Bombucha!"
This is not da bombucha. Not anywhere close.
Yeah this is pretty sweet! Figuratively. Kids still say that right?

Kombucha tastes awful. I love it. Anything that tastes that bad must be good for you, right? I love the kind with that puck of yeast and bacteria floating in it. Disgusting, it must prevent at least twelve diseases. Send me your worst batch. My body is ready.
This doesn't taste bad at all. It almost tastes good. This is not what I wanted.
This is the worst thing I've tasted. I can't feel my tongue. Perfect!
This tastes completely disgusting. Exactly what I wanted.
I'm devastated. I recently lost my mother. It happened so fast. Slipped right down the sink. I'd like an order of your Kombucha, I need a new mother.
I'll never have my mother back! This just isn't the same.
Forget my old mother! I love my new mother. Thank you for bringing us together.
I'll never have her back, but this new mother makes things a little better.
It turns out "dry clean only" was not simply a suggestion. My new Rug's toast. You know how to make Rugs and I've got Simoleons. Maybe we can help each other out?
I think I might just keep using my ruined rug instead of this new one. Thanks anyway.
This rug is even better than my last rug! Thanks so much!
Hey, this rug is pretty nice. This will do, thanks!

I represent a local rug dealer. They have extensive experience selling traditionally made rugs, including everything from braided rugs to woven rugs. In an effort to keep pace with new technologies they are requesting samples of 3d printed rugs for evaluation.
This is below our standards. We thank you for our submission but we have an image to maintain, and as such this will be going directly in the trash. Where it belongs.
This exceeds every one of our quality standards. We will be in touch.
This meets our standards of quality. Thank you for your time.

Why are showers so darn slippery! I sprained my ankle getting out of one last week. My doctor told me I could use a 3D printed rug as an anti-slip mat. I asked around and your service came up. Could you make me one? You might just save a life.
Your product somehow made my shower even more slippery. Now I've sprained my other ankle!
I feel so safe in my shower now that I could dance. In the shower. Thank you.
Exactly what I was looking for. Showering is a much less terrifying experience now. Thanks!

Tis I, the Merry King of Couches. I have rested my posterior on the finest seats in the land. Your name is making the rounds in my court. They say you are an artisan of note, master of the newest chaise crafting techniques. I request your finest lounge. Make me something worthy of my fundament.
I am displeased. You are fortunate that I have chosen not to rouse the local constabulary to imprison you for this heinous act of so called craftsmanship.
The poets shall sing your name! Never have I set my posterior on such a fine cushion!
I see I had impeccable judgement in choosing you.

You know that term couch surfing? I'm looking to make it literal. I'm starting the first ever couch surfing league! I'd like to purchase one of your couches. I need something sturdy to attach wheels to. Surf's up!
Bummer! This thing isn't safe to surf on.
Gnarly! This couch is perfect! I'm going to shred the streets on this thing.
Yeah! This is what I'm talking bout! Thanks!

Good morrow, I'm part of a local LARPing group. Recently our leader declared himself the King of Couches. But anyone who knows anything knows that I am the King of Couches. Anyway, he’s also declared us his serfs and demands Couches as offerings. We're humoring him for the time being. As such I'd like to order one of your Couches. Be well.
The King is awed by your crafting prowess. He has commissioned a bard to sing of your deeds.
The King accepts your offering. Be well.

Hey I'm huge into tofu. I heard you make something called, um, "ToFizz"? I'm not going to lie: I'm intrigued, but maybe this is past my comfort zone. Fizzy Tofu might be a soy-soaked bridge too far. The only way to find out is to order some so I can taste it myself. Hit me!
To Fizz or Not To Fizz
The client regrets ever asking you to "hit them".
The client reports they are now "huge" on Tofizz.
The client reports that Tofizz is "alright".

People keep talking about Flavor Country. I hate Flavor Country. I don't want to go to Flavor Country. I'm tired of all these flavorful beverages. I like my drinks boring. Make me some ToFizz, I hear it’s the blandest thing next to water.
This isn't boring at all! It's full of flavor and subtle delicious complexity! BLEGH! I hate it!
This is the most boring thing I've ever tasted. My taste buds weep at the cruel monotony of existence. Well done.
This is pretty boring. Just the way I like it. But it could be more boring.

Can you believe the junk people put in their bodies? Don't they know tofu is like totally the healthiest thing ever? It's all I eat and I'm the healthiest person you'll ever meet! I'm so freaking healthy. Now with your help, tofu will be the only thing I drink too. Let's do it. So healthy!
What have you done. This... is NOT healthy. I'm going to have to do at least five apple cider vinegar cleanses to recover.
This... is a GAME CHANGER! I've never felt so healthy in my life. I think I just might be the healthiest Sim in the world after drinking this nourishing Tofizz.
I'm feeling healthier already! So healthy!

Specializing in planning and organizing has brought {0.SimFirstName} this new opportunity. Get out into the real world and find out what the neighborhood needs to make the environment the best a Sim can live in.

{0.SimFirstName} is becoming an expert in gathering opinions and getting Sims in the neighborhood passionate about changes to their world. Using {F0.her}{M0.his} passion for improvement, {0.SimFirstName} can rally local Sims for a huge range of Neighborhood Action Plans to effect positive change.

{0.SimFirstName}'s passion for neighborhood improvement has fueled a keen design sense for making and presenting Municipal Concepts. Successfully submitting these blueprints for a better world can gain {0.SimFirstName} fame and fortune.

Organizing and interpreting plans and design documentation is the passion of the Civic Archivist. {0.SimFirstName} will balance high-level design work with the task of maintaining order among the chaos of a thousand planning permission permits.

Community trust and smart planning skills are key to success as a Neighborhood Improvement Officer. {0.SimFirstName} must juggle the conflicting priorities of business and residents to be successful in this position.

Combining technical skills with the highest level of planning, {0.SimFirstName} will be responsible for large scale improvements to infrastructure and utilities through every neighborhood. Everything from the layout of new parks to the vital pipework beneath Sims' feet is in {F0.her}{M0.his} purview.

Leading a team of Civic Planners to make foundational changes across all neighborhoods is the job of the City Master Planner. {0.SimFirstName} will need much design, planning and social skills to gain success at this career.

Improving Sim’s lives through the application of new greener technology is the aim of {0.SimFirstName} in this new opportunity. Dream big and bask in the glory of installing your first Composting Container.

{0.SimFirstName} will need all of the skill and ingenuity they can muster as they get back to the Drafting Tablet. As a Design Guru, {F0.her}{M0.his} main objective is to hone their drafting and design skills with ever more complex Eco-Invention Concepts.

Heading out into the real world, {0.SimFirstName} is making a name for themselves as they take existing products and interpret complicated squiggly diagrams to make modifications and improvements to real-world appliances and utilities.

Eco-Tech Scientists combine the latest research with cutting edge technology, pitching ideas for new Eco-Inventions to a range of manufacturing companies. {0.SimFirstName}'s passion for the environment helps inform {F0.her}{M0.his} choices.

{0.SimFirstName} uses all of their skills in product design and development to be a Device Savant. Their peak Drafting Tablet skills, product pitching and talents for eco-installation are now second to none.
An Expert Fabricator is a guru of manufacturing, using all of their skills and dexterity to craft everything from furniture and decorations to complicated devices like the Eco-Matic Smog Vacuum.

Reaching the pinnacle of eco-technology and innovation, {0.SimFirstName} is responsible for the invention of world class products, driving to produce more and better gadgets for the good of the planet. Master Inventors are also responsible for mentoring a whole team of junior designers looking for the next Big Idea.

{0.SimFirstName} has entered the exciting world of the Civil Designer, and {F0.she}{M0.he} is relishing the opportunity to solve such burning design and planning issues like the refurbishment of the public bathrooms in the local park.
Armed with a state of the art Drafting Tablet, {0.SimFirstName} will be making their 1st original designs. Who knows, they might even get their Municipal Concept into real production!

Who thought this was just an ideas business? As a Construction Technician, {0.SimFirstName} will use all their handiness and ingenuity to source new components and develop techniques to improve all kinds of common devices. Soon {0.SimFirstName} will need to decide on their specialism. Do they want to branch into a world of installation, inventions and ingenuity, or policies, planning and process?

Trade: Fabricator, Juice Fizzer, Candle Maker SIMply Crafted's mission is to deliver hand-crafted and responsibly sourced goodies to the eco-conscious Sims of the world. On demand, at your fingertips, devoid of guilt. So light up your Candles, sip up your Fizzy Juice, and relax on your Couch knowing that they were all dipped, upcycled, or fizzed with love by a true artisan. This note was printed on digitally recycled paper.

Trade: Freelance Crafter\n\nDo you regularly buy things from the store and think to yourself, "I could make something better"? Consider a career as a Freelance Crafter where you can produce goods with that often missing homemade charm.
As a Civil Designer, get involved in planning and designing solutions to all kinds of environmental problems, and chat to your fellow Sims about how to make their world a better place to live.
Green Technicians use all of their craft and ingenuity to design and construct new gadgetry and processes to greenify and enrich Sims' lives.
Planning is a passion of the Civic Planner, so get out into the world and canvas, rally and generally enthuse local Sims to improve their environment.
I'll work with the city to solve the problem.
"Acquire" a new couch. From the neighbors.
Build new furniture from the old stuff.
Mixing all soda flavors into one!
I once glued down some macaroni.
I use, I recycle, I use again!
I put my paper in the recycling bins.
There's a dumpster. It's not on fire, or anything...
The air quality in the neighborhood has gotten worse, what do I do?
I need a new couch. What's my go-to solution?
How much do I see recycling as a duty?
Ancient mysterious obelisks got nothin' on this behemoth pillar! Made of solid steel, this angular column offers a rustic, industrial look anywhere it's placed.
Strong enough for large structures, but chic enough to adorn any lot.

Hey-hey Champ! So get this: I have a cool business idea! This is going to be the Big One. But I uh... I just need a few more Simoleons to get it off the ground. Like, a thousand Simoleons. Do you think you could help a buddy out? You'll get it all back, and then some, I swear.
Call them out for never paying you back!
Sorry, I can't afford that right now.
I'm almost there in starting my company! But my pockets are running dry on Simoleons. Think you can give me an extra thousand to get to the finish line?

Yeah, so it looks like I'm going to need a thousand extra Simoleons because I actually blew the last thousand you gave me on getting a bunch of money crates in this phone game I've been playing. I swear I'll be more responsible with it this time!
You've been really generous. I'm getting close to starting my company but a thousand Simoleons goes pretty fast! I could use an extra hit of capital if that's okay.
So... eh... my business idea is still taking some time to get off the ground. I'm going to need just a thousand more bucks to move things forward. You've got me on this, right?

Once again, I am asking for your support for the "{1.String}" Neighborhood Action Plan. \n\nIt is going up for a vote... but currently "{2.String}" is predicted to win. We need every Sim to get out and vote! Can we trust that we'll have your support?
No way! I'm voting the opposite!
I'm with you! Change happens now!
So I found a ring in {2.SimFirstName}'s bag. I think {M2.he}{F2.she} is going to propose to me. I don't know what to do! What should I say!? Yes!? No!? Gahh!?

Dude. I had this weird dream: There was this monster... thing in our neighborhood and we all had to stay inside. But the monster wouldn't leave! We were all trapped in our homes for days... months... years (it was a dream, okay?). Then you went outside and the monster ate you. Why on earth would you go outside when a monster was right there in front of our eyes, {0.SimFirstName}?

Sorry to call out of the blue, but I had a dream about you last night. We were in a field and there were these electric llamas. And they were sleeping. I'm not sure why they were electric, but you wouldn't let me wake the llama. Why wouldn't you let me wake the llama, {0.SimFirstName}? Why?!

Oh {0.SimFirstName}! I had a very strange dream about you last night! We were at a party and you kept ignoring me. I went up to you and tried waving in your face but it was like you couldn't even see me. Was I invisible? Why didn't you see me!?
Woah.... I just had this dream... you were in it. We were both late for something. I can't remember what. Then you turned into a banana. What on earth made you want to turn into banana?
We've been thinking about Trying for a Baby lately. Do you think we should do it? We want to, but we're not sure. It's a huge responsibility! What do you think?
Are you sure you're ready for that?
Hey {0.SimFirstName}, I've been feeling pretty down in the dumps lately. Nothing seems to be going my way. I figured if anybody could cheer me up, it's you!

So, this is going to sound crazy... I know we're friends and all but... well... okay here it goes: I HAVE A CRUSH ON YOU. Phew. Okay it's out there. Um... so... would you want to go out with me sometime? You're super cool. I really want to hang out with you more... ?
Of course! Let's go on a date!
Our neighborhood is kind of icky, isn't it? I was going to try and start recycling to do my part. What about you? Do you think you might start recycling?
I am so mad today! I don't even know why... just... nothing seems to be going my way! I hope you have something good to say, {0.SimFirstName}, because I need someone to calm me down...
Some Sims, right? I had an acquaintance over and they just suddenly started raiding my fridge for food. They didn't even ask! It's so rude!

Today made me so angry! One guy just kept asking me about my day over and over again. You think I'm going to just be your friend if you keep repeating the same question over and over? Sheesh... some Sims.
So, listen, there's something I have to know about you okay. It might determine our friendship:\n\nDo you pronounce GIF with a "G"?
There's something that I have to ask you. To me it's painfully obvious... but I want to get your take:\n\nDo you think we're in a simulation right now?
I have to ask you one of the most important questions of our time. Are you ready... okay so here it is: \n\nIs a hotdog a sandwich?
There is a very important question I have to ask you... ready? So...\n\nIs water wet?
I'm going to ask you something... important... okay so here it is... \n\nIs cereal soup?
I've called to inform you that your great-great-grand-second-once-removed-cousin's friend's grandpa has passed away and for some reason has left a vast fortune specifically to you. Will you accept?
Landgraab Power Company Safety Alert: Due to squirrels we are going to turn off your power some time in the next 48 hours. Are you prepared?

Hey Honey, it's {M1.Dad}{F1.Mom}. When are you going to come visit? I put all my love and effort into raising you. You can at least drop by once in a while and tell your {M1.old Dad}{F1.dear Mommy} you love {M1.him}{F1.her}, can't you?
Why don't you come over right now?
Um... I can't... But it was nice talking to you.
They're coming soon. Maybe you should think twice about opening the door.
The drop off has been made. Don't be late.
We're fixing your phone line. Don't pick it up the next time someone calls.
The number 6 will be very important to you in the next 24 hours.
You have been chosen. They will come soon.
I saw what you did last week. I was there. I saw everything. You're in big trouble, {M0.Mister}{F0.Missy}.
Hey what's up, {M0.bro}{F0.sis}! Want to see this new Simstagram meme I found? I thought it was pretty funny. What do you think?
Ohhh.... I get it... ha... ha.... ha...?
My business is taking off! All thanks to you! I want to give you at least half this month's earnings as a reward for all the trouble I put you through. Just sign here...
I don't need the money. I'm glad that it helped you out.
Half the monthly earnings?! Thank you so much!
Do you wish you looked as happy as I do? Well, you have the power. Just send one Simoleon to me. Don't delay, happiness is just a Simoleon away.

Have you ever heard of something called The Motive Trials? Apparently they take a bunch of Sims and put them in some remote place and let them battle it out... like royally. Do you think you'd want to be a part of something like that?
Only if it lasts less than a fortnight.

{0.SimFirstName}. What if I told you that we are all just in a Simulation? I know, I know. It's alarming, but there is a way out. I offer you a choice: You can either ignore this and go about your "life"... Or you can come with me and we'll see just how far down this rabbit hole goes. The choice is yours...
Hello? Oh... uh... is this Vinny?
Hey, no dice. That thing you helped me invest in didn't quite work out. But hey, better luck next time! Thanks for your support, Champ.
Fantastic news. Your investments went swimmingly and have a wonderful payout of {2.Money}.
Made from upcycled schoolroom chalkboards, this slate fence is a classy alternative to a possibly wasteful wooden alternative.

Most engineers are encouraged to think outside the box, but when that box is full of waffles, we say that's where some of the best inspiration comes from. Our team turned toward their favorite breakfast item to develop this medium version "waffle-weave" bamboo fence. Made of supple bamboo, the fence bends with the wind creating a sturdy privacy barrier while still letting that delicious, buttery sunlight in. Mmm, mmm!

Most engineers are encouraged to think outside the box, but when that box is full of waffles, we say that's where some of the best inspiration comes from. Our team turned toward their favorite breakfast item to develop this "waffle-weave" bamboo fence. Made of supple bamboo, the fence bends with the wind creating a sturdy privacy barrier while still letting that delicious, buttery sunlight in. Mmm, mmm!

Most engineers are encouraged to think outside the box, but when that box is full of waffles, we say that's where some of the best inspiration comes from. Our team turned toward their favorite breakfast item to develop this "waffle-weave" bamboo fence. Made of supple bamboo, the fence bends with the wind creating a sturdy privacy barrier while still letting that delicious, buttery sunlight in. Mmm, mmm!
With Mother Earth's Activity Table, let nature be your crafty kid's canvas for creativity!

An atmospheric water generator (AWG) doesn't actually generate water, but rather pulls drinkable, usable water from the surrounding air. While it does require fuel to power, an AWG can help cut costs on water bills or provide water on off-the-grid lots.

A delicate, modern awning. Made with simple materials but to last a lifetime. This glass awning not only protects your doorway, but also lets you see if the Welcome Wagon is coming by from the second floor.

A wider version of the Awning Of Transparency, perfect for those doorways that need a bit of extra cover. This intuitive design will help your lot look very sleek and modern while adorning it without much fuss.
Don't let its appearance fool you, this awning is perfect for protecting your doorway from the sun's rays and the elements. Its fawned design will give your lot a contemporary look.

TMI Industries of Washkansin has re-imagined what a bathtub of ALL Recycled materials can look like and, frankly, it looks a lot like you – in the buff. So put your backside on the inside of this semi see thru tub. But keep in mind that you might have a potentially embarrassing soak. Crikey!! Doesn’t anyone knock anymore?
Rear View Tub – by TMI Industries
Everyone needs a bed that is comfortable, practical, and made from the heart. And also from a Fabricator. But mostly from the heart.

Are you lonely at night? Well, with the bed-bug infested Dirty Double, you will never sleep alone again! Recovered from a seedy street corner, the Dirty Double smells like corroding compost and is slathered with an unsavory slimy substance. How can you not be sold on a deal like this?
What is better than a Cozy Bundled Single? A Cozy Bundled Double! More room for more cozy layers and pillows, more to love!
Sleep soundly knowing your bed was made with love… and recycled bits and pieces.
Teach your kids some resourcefulness by turning one man’s trash into a comfy treasure. This bed will help the little ones go to sleep in no time.

Here at Fortigo products we make trees in boxes by utilizing a highly technical proprietary process. This consists of carefully throwing used pallets into haphazard stacks in the dirt lot behind our building. At this point we work hand in hand with Mother Nature by letting nature run its course. And just like in the cracks of the road, pretty quickly greenery starts growing out of the nooks & crannies in those pallets. We scrape off any mossy looking junk but keep the tree & flower looking stuff where it grows. The next thing you know you got a big ol' box of nature going. Thanks mom.
Tree To Get Ready – Fortigo Products

Don't be duped by air freshener ads. Make your own fresh air with this planter! Made from roughly hewn stone and refurbished corks from old bottles, this planter can house three lovely plants, each ready to provide you with free, oxygenated air. Ah...talk about a breath of fresh... free air!

Think upcycling is just for furniture? Think again! Sadly, thousands of plants are abandoned out on the streets every day. This particular plant was found on a street corner, tipped on its side. It likes indirect light, water, and being sung to. Will you give it a forever home and prove that the grass can be greener on the other side?

What can you do with a gently used cannonball? Well, you could melt it into another cannonball and chuck it back. But how does that help anyone? As the Red Herring ages, the tug of nature becomes overwhelming & the fish concedes to instinctively swim upstream to perish. The very head waters that once nurtured the Red Herring now slowly consume the once mighty fish. Within days, all that remains are large wooden planks of herringbone, strewn about the river banks. Those planks will be collected by locals and recycled into wall art & sold at garage sales - thus completing the circle of life.

They could drop the internal temperature of your home by up to 92 degrees. That’ll save you a bundle in lemonade costs alone. And talk about quiet? You’ll never hear them growing – guaranteed!

They could drop the internal temperature of your home by up to 92 degrees. That’ll save you a bundle in lemonade costs alone. And talk about quiet? You’ll never hear them growing – guaranteed!

Wrap your home up as snug as a bug in a bean burrito. Just install these eco-friendly, 5 meter high, Nature's Blanket living planter boxes on the side of your abode. They could drop the internal temperature of your home by up to 92 degrees. That’ll save you a bundle in lemonade costs alone. And talk about quiet? You’ll never hear them growing – guaranteed!

Featuring a tapestry of individually crafted pieces that swivel and turn... much like life, yo. See you on the flipside.
See You on the Flipside Wall

In the ‘80s Hair Metal Glam Bands ruled and headbangers like Motley Sister, Shreder, Skid Marxx & Gums & Roseburg were on top of Metal Mountain. Now, for an unlimited time only, you can own a piece of Heavy Metal History. Recycled Memories proudly presents - The Art of Pants, Left Side. A collection of wall art tastefully created using pieces of those awkwardly tight pants your favorite singer or guitarist once wore on stage. Wicked? Totally!

In the ‘80s Hair Metal Glam Bands ruled and headbangers like Motley Sister, Shreder, Skid Marxx & Gums & Roseburg were on top of Metal Mountain. Now, for an unlimited time only, you can own the OTHER piece of Heavy Metal History. Recycled Memories proudly presents The Art of Pants, Side Right. A collection of wall art tastefully created using pieces of those awkwardly tight pants your favorite singer or guitarist once wore on stage. Wicked? Totally!

Sometimes, for a moment, we crave a a bit of a wall relief. But in this case some wooden slats detail to accent our walls will do for when we can't carve out one from the surface of the wall itself. Vertical, beautiful, and simple lines to add the feeling of height to your space. Swept away by the lines, you will wonder... are there 3 gaps, or 4 lines?
Lines In The Wall - Vertical Lines

Sometimes, for a moment, we crave a a bit of a wall relief. But in this case some wooden slats detail to accent our walls will do for when we can't carve out one from the surface of the wall itself. Vertical, beautiful, and simple lines to add the feeling of height to your space. Swept away by the lines, you will wonder... are there 3 gaps, or 4 lines? Why do they seem endless?
